background_layout=”dark” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SUCCEED IN YOUR STUDIES, YOUR EXAMS, YOUR PROJECTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”justified” background_layout=”dark” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This introductory course in Phosphenic Mixing will allow you to understand:
– Why the light is a source of well-being and a natural stimulant.
– How to structure ideas thanks the light.
– What are the techniques which improve learning, concentration, and reasoning.
– Why failing at school is not a fatality.
– How to overcome troubles such as dyslexia or dysorthographia.
– How to increase your chances of succeeding exams.
– Why the rhythm is another secret of success.

Thus, you will improve your capabilities and optimize your performances by using the extraordinary energy of phosphenes.

This e-box set contains:

A 110 minutes audio set (33,4 Mo) with 1 track in .mp3 format.

This theoretical and practical course of Phosphenic Mixing is ideal for children and adults in their learning processes.

+ An e-book ‟The ABC of Phosphenic Mixing” in .pdf format.

May be consulted on your computer (Mac or PC) or on your smartphone to better understand how to practice this amazing technique.
